content.rendered:
Delicious vegan waffles drizzled with golden or maple syrup served with crunchy Fry’s Family Chicken-style Nuggets. This is the ultimate comfort food, with the option of making it hot and spicy!

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS
Waffles
2 C (500 ml) cake wheat flour
¼ C (60 ml) brown sugar
2 tsp (10 ml) baking powder
2 C (500 ml) coconut milk
¼ C (60 ml) water – add water to the batter as necessary
3 Tbsp (45 ml) sunflower oil
½ tsp (2,5 ml) cinnamon
¼ tsp (1,25 ml) salt
Non-stick spray
Nuggets
1 x 380 g box Fry’s Chicken-Style Nuggets, cooked according to the package instructions
Hot & Spicy Syrup
½ C (125 ml) golden or maple syrup
1 tsp (5 ml) your favourite hot sauce (optional)
1 Tbsp (15 ml) coconut oil

Directions

Waffles

Add all the ingredients for the waffles into a large mixing bowl, adding in the water as necessary until you reach a good syrup consistency. Fold to combine but do not over mix. Having some lumps in the batter is fine.

Preheat a waffle iron and spray with non-stick spray. Spoon about ¼ cup of batter into the waffle machine and cook until the waffle is done (test the amount of batter needed for your waffle machine). Give each waffle a light brush of vegan butter as they come out and stack them up to keep warm.

Hot & Spicy Syrup

Add the syrup, hot sauce and coconut oil to a small pot over medium heat. Heat and mix to combine then remove the pot from the heat.

Top the waffle stack with Fry’s Chicken-Style Nuggets and drizzle with hot syrup sauce or just regular maple or golden syrup and serve.
